summary: vly.ai is building the world's best AI full-stack developer, run completely on the web. They focus on automating the full-stack developer role to create the next generation of web software automation, catering especially to companies and non-technical founders.
product: An AI-powered full-stack developer platform that automates web software development entirely on the web. It serves as an AI IDE that outperforms competitors like Lovable, Replit, and Bolt, providing a comprehensive and user-friendly development experience.
team: Victor Cheng is the Co-Founder and CEO of vly.ai. The team is active and recently launched on YC (Y Combinator) F24 batch.
traction: Launched on YC F24, with positive user feedback highlighting it as the best all-around AI IDE compared to competitors.
funding: Seed funding from Y Combinator F24 batch.
market: Web software automation and AI-driven full-stack development tools, targeting companies and non-technical founders seeking to automate software creation.
